Simulate latent process with noise

Source: R/simulation.R
simulate.ngme_model.Rd

Simulate latent process with noise

# S3 method for ngme_model
simulate(object, nsim = 1, seed = NULL, ...)

Arguments

object

ngme model specified by f() function

nsim

number of simulations

seed

seed

...

ignored

Value

a realization of latent model

Examples

simulate(f(1:10, model="ar1", rho = 0.4, noise = noise_nig()))
#>         sim_1
#> 1   1.0020843
#> 2   0.1960287
#> 3   1.0072600
#> 4   0.9469332
#> 5   0.3162310
#> 6  -1.0094546
#> 7  -0.6647384
#> 8  -0.4326453
#> 9  -0.2136398
#> 10 -1.1480590
simulate(f(rnorm(10), model="rw1", noise = noise_normal()))
#>          sim_1
#> 1  -0.74433786
#> 2  -0.66421140
#> 3  -0.01897484
#> 4   0.38575359
#> 5   0.49191575
#> 6  -0.01505002
#> 7  -0.01396057
#> 8   0.08991045
#> 9   0.52089707
#> 10 -0.03194215
